name: Age of Wonders: Shadow Magic
summary: Age of Wonders: Shadow Magic is a turn-based strategy video game in a fantasy setting. Shadow Magic is the third incarnation of the Age of Wonders series, and is a direct sequel to Age of Wonders II: The Wizard's Throne. All three games were developed by Triumph Studios, a Dutch video game developer. The series is the spiritual successor to Master of Magic.
